Articles.Content: Ok so I have gotten really far in my career.  I have a big expedition to Duna going and everything.  I have all sorts of Com networks via Remote Tech.  I have spent weeks building in this game and now a lot of bugs are ruining it.  My main station that Is in Route to Duna flies away every time I load it up.  All my other craft have an offset camera view and slowly moves away and all my docking ports on my interplanetary ships are missing meaning I cant dock.  Please help!  If there is any way that someone can help I would be more than happy to accept it.
